summary: transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV) infection can activate NF-B pathway in porcine intestinal epithelial cells and result in severe inflammation. ncRNAs play an important role in many biological and pathological processes such as inflammation, viral infection, and mitochondrial damage. ssc_circ_009380 promoted activation of NF-B pathway by binding miR-22 during TGEV-induced inflammation. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article contains supplementary material, which is available to authorized users.
